content:
Hello Firely-Team (e.g. @Ward Weistra , @Alexander Zautke , @Ewout Kramer),

are you currently working on Simplifier? I have problems viewing my profiles and examples and can't validate. If you are currently working, I will continue my work tomorrow.

Thanks in advance for answers.

Hi @Mareike Przysucha, thanks for the notification, I'm sorry you were having trouble.
For me everything seems to work fine (e.g. this validation) and our systems seem to indicate they're fine. However, it does remind me of @Patrick Werner 's recent report. Can you check again, to see if it was temporary?
If so, I'm eager to hear from both of you what exactly you saw so we can investigate. Were these timeouts, indefinite spinners or textual error messages?
seams to have been a temporary issue. validating examples an showing profiles works fine now. Thanks @Ward Weistra for investigating!!!
We did find some irregularities in the logs, so we will look deeper how to prevent this from happening!
